tool_description: Summarize text using an abstractive summarizer based on the GPT machine learning model.
name: GPT Summarization
title: GPT Summarization

api_list.name: summarize
api_list.description:
Summarizes text.

Parameters:
`text`: Text to summarize (can be preprocessed)
OPTIONAL `num_sentences`: Rough number of sentences to return (default: 3)

Returns:
`summary`: Summarized text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gpt-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gpt-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gpt-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gpt-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
